title: Implement rate interval subsystem
description: Implement rate interval subsystem using governor with 1.5x velocity and 2s time-base

title: Implement GitHub provider
description: Implement GitHub provider with async detection and rate limit header parsing

title: Define Provider trait
description: Define Provider trait with async detect() method and rate limiters. Basic trait exists but needs detect() method for URL provider detection.

title: Implement reverse buffer reader
description: Implement reverse file reader with 4k-aligned buffer reads from file end, tracking lines read from bottom. Already implemented in util/reader.rs with 4096-byte chunk size and proper handling of incomplete first buffer.

title: Setup Cargo.toml dependencies
description: Initialize Cargo.toml with clap, clap_complete, tokio, anyhow, reqwest, governor, config, directories crates

title: Implement failure logging
description: Create failure logging to .fail file with URL and error code format. Already implemented in failure.rs with format: "<URL> <ERROR-CODE>"

title: Implement basic CLI parsing
description: Implement CLI entry point with clap derive parser for readme-get command. Already implemented in cli.rs with clap derive. Add completion generation.

title: Implement GitLab provider
description: Implement GitLab provider with async detection and rate limiting

title: Core Utilities
description: Implement core utility modules: position tracking, reverse buffer reader, failure logging
acceptance_criteria:
- src/util/mod.rs with exports
- src/util/reader.rs with position tracking + 4k-aligned reverse buffer reader
- src/failure.rs for .fail file logging
- Async config position updates every 2s

title: Implement basic readme-get command
description: Implement readme-get command to download READMEs maintaining URL directory structure

title: Implement Codeberg provider
description: Implement Codeberg provider with async detection and rate limiting

title: readme-get Command
description: Implement the readme-get command to download READMEs from repos in archlist
acceptance_criteria:
- src/commands/readme_get.rs module
- Processes archlist from bottom to top
- Downloads READMEs maintaining URL structure
- Creates directories for repos without README
- Supports --top-down, --refresh flags

title: Rate Limiting
description: Implement rate interval subsystem using governor crate with provider-specific limits
acceptance_criteria:
- src/util/ratelimit.rs module
- Governor configured at 1.5x velocity, 2s time-base
- is_ok() checks against provider rate limits
- Stops when provider credits exhausted

title: Implement config management
description: Implement config file management using directories crate to locate config and config crate to parse. Already implemented in config.rs with ProjectDirs, ConfigBuilder, and serde.

title: Provider System
description: Implement provider trait with async detection and rate limiters for GitHub/GitLab/HuggingFace/Codeberg
acceptance_criteria:
- src/provider/mod.rs with Provider trait
- Async detect(url) -> Option<Box<dyn Provider>>
- Async rate limiter per provider
- GitHub implementation with rate limit headers
- GitLab, HuggingFace, Codeberg implementations

title: Add position tracking
description: Add position tracking as lines from bottom, integrate with reverse buffer reader

title: Add readme-get flags
description: Add --top-down and --refresh flags to readme-get command. Already implemented in cli.rs:20-27

title: Add rate limit validation
description: Add is_ok() method to check against provider rate limits before allowing requests

title: Config Management
description: Implement config file management using directories and config crates
acceptance_criteria:
- src/config.rs module
- Uses directories crate for config location
- Uses config crate for config parsing
- Stores lines_from_bottom position
- Async writer updates every 2s

title: Implement HuggingFace provider
description: Implement HuggingFace provider with async detection and rate limiting

title: Add async position sync to config
description: Store lines_from_bottom position in config and set up async writer to update every 2s

title: Create source directory structure
description: Create src/ directory structure: main.rs, cli.rs, commands/, provider/, util/

title: Project Setup
description: Set up basic Rust CLI scaffolding with dependencies and project structure
acceptance_criteria:
- Cargo.toml with all dependencies configured
- Basic src/ directory structure created
- CLI entry point with clap
- README updated with installation instructions
